com.analog.lyric.options

Class ConstructorOptionKey<SuperClass>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.options.OptionKey<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass>>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionKey<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass>>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericSamplerOptionKey, ProposalKernelOptionKey

    @Immutable
public abstract class ConstructorOptionKey<SuperClass>
extends ClassOptionKey<SuperClass>
    Key for options with literal Java class values with accessible no-argument constructor.

    Since:
    0.07
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConstructorOptionKey

        public ConstructorOptionKey(java.lang.Class<?> declaringClass,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.Class<SuperClass> superClass,
                    java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass> defaultValue)
        Construct a class option key.
        Parameters:
        declaringClass - is the class containing the static field declaration for this key.
        name - is the name of static field declaration for this key.
        superClass - is the superclass of all valid values. Should be same as the declared <SuperClass> parameter.
        defaultValue - is the default value of the option. Used when option is not set.
        Since:
        0.07

    • Method Detail

      • convertToExternal

        public java.lang.Object convertToExternal(java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass> value)
        Converts value to an external representation

        Converts value to representation suitable for use in external environments such as MATLAB or Python. Acceptable output types include boxed primitive types, Strings, and arrays of the those.

        It is expected that the returned value can be converted back to the original typed value using IOptionKey.convertToValue(java.lang.Object).

        Returns fully qualified name of the class value.

        Returns simple name of class value if in registry and otherwise returns the fully qualified class name.

        Specified by:
        convertToExternal in interface IOptionKey<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass>>
        Overrides:
        convertToExternal in class ClassOptionKey<SuperClass>

      • convertToValue

        public java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass> convertToValue(@Nullable
                                                   java.lang.Object value)
        Attempts to convert value to appropriate key value type.

        This method should be able to convert values produced by IOptionKey.convertToExternal(T).

        If value is a string. This will attempt to load the class from the string using Class.forName with context class loader. Subclasses may want to extend this to allow construction from simple class names.

        If the value is a string, this will attempt to look the class up in this key's registry and otherwise will attempt to load the class using Class.forName with context class loader.

        Specified by:
        convertToValue in interface IOptionKey<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass>>
        Overrides:
        convertToValue in class ClassOptionKey<SuperClass>
        Parameters:
        value - a non-null value to be converted to the option's IOptionKey.type().

      • validate

        public java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass> validate(java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass> value,
                                             @Nullable
                                             IOptionHolder optionHolder)
        Description copied from interface: IOptionKey
        Validates value for this key.

        This is invoked by implementations of IOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T) and can be overridden to put extra constraints on the value.

        Specified by:
        validate in interface IOptionKey<java.lang.Class<? extends SuperClass>>
        Overrides:
        validate in class ClassOptionKey<SuperClass>
        Parameters:
        value - is the value to be set on this option.
        optionHolder - is the option holder on which the option is being set, if available.
        Returns:
        the value itself if valid otherwise throws an exception.

      • getRegistry

        public abstract ConstructorRegistry<SuperClass> getRegistry()
        The constructor registry associated with this key, if any.

        0.07

        convertToValue(Object)

      • instantiate

        public SuperClass instantiate(IOptionHolder holder)
        Instantiates new instance of class that is the current value of this option.

        Looks up value of class using OptionKey.getOrDefault(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionHolder) and instantiates it using Class.newInstance() with no arguments.

        Parameters:
        holder - is a non-null option holder.
        Since:
        0.07

      • instantiateIfDifferent

        public SuperClass instantiateIfDifferent(IOptionHolder holder,
                                @Nullable
                                SuperClass prev)
        Returns instance of class that is the current value of this option, instantiating if different from existing value.

        This is similar to instantiate(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionHolder) but will return prev if it its non-null and is already an instance of the class retrieved by OptionKey.getOrDefault(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionHolder).

        Parameters:
        holder - is a non-null option holder.
        prev - is a possibly-null existing instance.
        Since:
        0.07
